## Load Xeva
Load Xeva library and data

```{r, echo=TRUE}
library(Xeva)
data(pdxe)
```

## Access experiment slot

Get all model.id for which drug "paclitaxel" was used and tumor.type is "BRCA"
```{r, echo=TRUE}
modelIds = getModelIds(pdxe, drug="paclitaxel", drug.match.exact=TRUE, tumor.type="BRCA")
print(modelIds)
```

To get the data for a model id 
```{r, echo=TRUE}
df = getExperiment(pdxe, model.id="X.1655.LE11.biib")
head(df)
```
